titleStmt.title: The voyce of the just uttered: his passing out of Ægypt through the Red Sea, through the wildernesse to the promised land, where rest and peace is enjoyed. / By him who is known to the world by the name of Thomas Symonds.
titleStmt.author: Simonds, Thomas, d. 1666.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
